name: Single Mattress
description: Client is a 19 years old mother of infant twins who just moved in to her 1-room rental flat. Due to her caregiving role and responsibilities, client is unable to work and is hoping to receive one single size mattress for her children to rest comfortably. Please WhatsApp Jie Qi at 8484 6181 or email to jieqi.yeo@thkmc.org.sg to liaise.

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Tanjong Pagar
contact.name: Lynette Tan

passiton.name: single bed mattress and frame
passiton.description: IKEA single bed with mattress. Only used a handful of times. Excellent condition

name: Stroller
description: Family of four with a 4 year old boy with cancer, who needs a sturdy but lightweight stroller. The stroller that he used before diagnosis and hospital treatment is unsuitable now. The child is unable to walk independently for now, and will have weekly appointments at hospital after discharge. Father is sole breadwinner as mother has to care for the younger sibling, who is only a few months old.

passiton.name: stroller
passiton.description: preloved stroller. clean. wheels still ok but not so smooth to maneuver. can fold into umbrella style to store. for light weight child 4-5 years old shld be ok

name: Vacuum
description: Client, 55-year-old, who is certified medically unfit for work, is in need of a vacuum as he does not have the strength to sweep floor manually. Client is financially dependent on SSO financial assistance and is unable to bear the expenses to purchase a vacuum.

passiton.name: Cordless Vacuum Cleaner - Philips
passiton.description: Cordless Philips Vacuum cleaner, with all accessories and mounting bracket. Works well and useful. Has usual wear and tear, no issues with cleaning however.

name: Vacuum cleaner
description: Client is a single parent with 3 children (F/16, F/13, M/11). Her husband left their home in 2016 and has not been contributing to the family's expenses. Client has depression and anxiety. She's currently on medical leave and medication. The family has been relying on FA since 2016. It will be beneficial for client to receive a vacuum cleaner as her current one has spoilt.

passiton.name: Cordless Vacuum Cleaner - Philips
passiton.description: Cordless Philips Vacuum cleaner, with all accessories and mounting bracket. Works well and useful. Has usual wear and tear, no issues with cleaning however.
